name: Interactive Computer Graphics
body:
## Welcome to My Repository.
This repository has the code for assignments given for the course CS6533 - Interactive Computer Graphics, taken at New York University, Polytechnic Institute. This is a personal repository to maintain my assignments.

### The Repository Contains Code for Following Assignments (so far):
```
Assignment 1 (Final)
Assignment 2 (Final)
Assignment 3 (Final)
Assignment 4 (Beta)
```

### Disclaimer
You can use this code **only** for reference. I will not be held responsible if the code doesn't work. Also I do not account for plagiarism. Please use this **only** for reference.
 
### Critics are Welcome
If you see that code is not efficient or has bug etc., you are welcome to criticize my work as they will improve the output.

### Support or Contact
Do not contact me just saying, "Your code sucks", although you can say _where_ my code sucks!
Contact through my email from the profiles page.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
